casebody.data:
Curtis T. LOVELACE, petitioner,
v.
ILLINOIS. No. 18-809. Supreme Court of the United States May 13, 2019.

Motion of The Fines and Fees Justice Center, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The National Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari *2011to the Appellate Court of Illinois, Fourth District denied.
